Html:
Is it possible to get a negative number to be formatted in red with parenthesis around it? It's a standard number formatting option in Excel.
I can't use conditional formatting because I need to maintain compatibility with Office 2k3.

Thanks!

C.Durbin

Try a formatting mask like "[Green]#,##0;[Red](-#,##0)"

e.g.
$this->_objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle($cellID)->getNumberFormat()->setFormatCode("[Green]#,##0;[Red](-#,##0)");

MarkBaker wrote:
Try a formatting mask like "[Green]#,##0;[Red](-#,##0)"

e.g.
$this->_objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getStyle($cellID)->getNumberFormat()->setFormatCode("[Green]#,##0;[Red](-#,##0)");

Works perfectly! Thank you!

C.Durbin
